author: werpu
msg: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MYFACES-3653 fix for the focus issue, thanks to the icefaces team for providing the patch

author: brett
msg: [CONTINUUM-2696] Attempting to enable a build agent that is down will remove it from the list

Instead of removing failed agents in the method that is only used from the agent configuration screen, leave it untouched if there is a failure. The agent configuration screen can therefore avoid adding a new agent, or editing an existing one, if the update fails.

author: werpu
